import React from 'react' import './CheckoutProduct.css' import { useContext } from 'react' import CommerceContext from './context/commerce-context' function CheckoutProduct({ key, title, image, pricing }) { const {removeFromCart } = useContext(CommerceContext) function ftnRemoveItem(e) { e.preventDefault() removeFromCart(key) } return (

{title}

$ {pricing}

) } export default CheckoutProduct
